text: Verily We created man the species from a drop of mixed fluid from a mixture that is from the seminal fluid of the man and the ovarian fluid of the woman that have mixed and blended so that We may test him trying him with the moral obligations of religion nabtalīhi is either a new sentence ‘We will test him’ or an implied circumstantial qualifier meaning ‘intending to test him when he is ready’. So We made him for that very reason hearing seeing.
